name: air conditioner
description: A household AC unit, designed to be mounted in a window.

name: freezer
description: A large and heavy freezer, used in restaurants, megastores and other environments where you need a large volume of things frozen.

name: glass refrigerator
description: A glass refrigerator.  Used to display chilled goods in shops.
//: Glass fridges are lighter than steel, but the volume is larger because of the furniture item.

name: glass freezer
description: A glass freezer.  Used to display frozen goods in shops.

name: plutonium generator
description: A generator used on large ships or submarines.  Using a compact nuclear reactor, refined nuclear fuel is sealed within and configured to provide a constant low yield of power when properly installed.  It could be taken apart to reuse the minireactor for more energy-intensive applications, or installed in a local grid to continue providing a small but limitless source of electricity.

name: metal compactor
description: A hydraulic compactor that can accept items made of various metals, and press them into basic shapes, ready for further crafting.

name: exercise machine
description: Typically used for, well, exercising.  Could be set up to pump some iron, or scrapped for parts.

name: ball machine
description: A machine used to launch various balls for different types of sports.  Could be set back up and connected to the grid to play with, or disassembled for parts.

name: pool table
description: A good-looking pool table.  Could be set back up or scrapped for parts.

name: arcade machine
description: Play stupid games, win stupid prizes.  That was the idea, anyway.  Good for all kinds of electronic parts, or you could hook it up to the grid and see if it still works.

name: pinball machine
description: Most underrated game of the 20th century.  Press buttons so the ball doesn't go in the hole.  Unless you hook it back up to the power grid, it's only good for parts.

name: ergometer
description: A rowing exercise machine, might have useful parts in it.  Could also be set back up if you feel you need the exercise.

name: treadmill
description: Used for training leg muscles.  If you set it back up and provide electrical power it'd be a great way to run in circles, otherwise it's just a source of scrap.

name: punching bag
description: Punch Punch!  Exercise those arms!  It won't be fighting back anytime soon, now it's only good for parts unless you set it back up.

name: dancing pole
description: Tall metal pole meant for dancing.  Setting it back up again will let you practice your moves.

name: roulette table
description: A big, scratched roulette table.  Could be set back up to take it for a spin, or just taken apart for material.
